name: New Order of Alexandria: Military Tactics RPG
name_original: New Order of Alexandria: Military Tactics RPG
description:
This is a RPG Maker XP Game called New Order of Alexandria: Military Tactics RPG, which is a Role Playing game based off the novel; The New Order of Alexandria. With over 9 different endings to discover, pick sides in this epic war set in a Post Apocalyptic world, where Climate Change has destroyed Western Civilization.  The NOA, USA, Riverway and Independence fight for ownership of the island. Pick a side and live with the consequences! 

The game can be completed in 1 Hour, but there are 9 Different story branches that essentially gives the game a lot of replay value.
